subject: Basketball
National Invitation Tournament
lead_paragraph: Luke Harangody had 30 points and 11 rebounds, and Notre Dame hit 12 3-pointers to end a 10-game losing streak to Kentucky, winning at home, 77-67, to advance to the National Invitation Tournament semifinals. The Irish (21-14) will face Penn State (25-11) on Tuesday night at Madison Square Garden.
